top.title: Anthropic Said to Be in Talks to Raise Funding at a $350 Billion Valuation
top.snippet: The artificial intelligence start-up, which competes with OpenAI, is aiming to raise around $10 billion amid talk of a potential initial public offering.

top.title: An Interview with Jeremie Eliahou Ontiveros and Ajey Pandey About Building Power for AI

top.title: China Is Investigating Meta’s Acquisition of the AI Start-Ip Manus

top.aiSummary:
AI-Generated Summary:
China is investigating Meta's acquisition of the AI start-up Manus to ensure compliance with export and investment rules.

top.title: Can A.I. Match Molière’s Wit? These Researchers Think So.
top.snippet: Scholars and artists at Sorbonne University trained artificial intelligence to imitate the French playwright’s themes, structures and sense of humor. The result is a new play.
top.rerankWhy: Exploration of AI's creative capabilities in theater
top.aiSummary: AI researchers at Sorbonne University have successfully trained artificial intelligence to mimic the themes, structures, and humor of French playwright Molière, resulting in the creation of a new play.

top.title: Modern Retail+ Research: The marketer’s guide to AI applications, agentic AI, AI search and GEO/AEO in 2026
top.snippet: AI adoption among marketers has almost doubled in the last three years, but optimized workflow integration has lagged behind. And marketers still struggle with technical integrations of agents and AI search strategies. AI search is reducing referral traffic through zero-click. Modern Retail’s annual AI report looks at different strategies to overcome future AI obstacles.
top.rerankWhy: Research on AI applications in marketing strategies
top.aiSummary: AI adoption among marketers has increased significantly, but challenges remain in integrating AI into workflows and technical aspects like agents and AI search strategies. Modern Retail's annual AI report explores strategies to address these obstacles and the impact of AI on referral traffic.

top.title: Marketplace Briefing: Amazon skips its Black Friday and Cyber Monday recap for the first time since 2016
top.snippet: Amazon broke a long-standing holiday tradition in 2025 by not publishing a post–Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales recap, marking the first time in nearly a decade that the company has stayed silent after one of its biggest shopping periods.

top.aiSummary:
AI-generated summary:
Amazon broke tradition in 2025 by not releasing a post-Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales recap, marking the first time since 2016 that the company remained silent after the major shopping period.

top.title: US e-commerce spend reached nearly $258B over the holidays
top.snippet: Adobe Analytics data found consumer spending grew 6.8% compared to 2024, with buy now, pay later usage reaching a new high.
top.rerankWhy: Holiday ecommerce spending growth indicates market resilience
top.aiSummary:
AI-Generated Summary:
US e-commerce spending during the holidays in 2025 reached almost $258 billion, showing a 6.8% increase from the previous year. The use of buy now, pay later services also saw a significant rise, according to Adobe Analytics data.

top.title: Inflation set to remain sticky in 2026
top.snippet:
As we enter into 2026, inflation rates are increasing as prices continued to edge up at the end of last year.
